channel.title: Bms4001_p1 on HTSanalyzeR2
channel.description: Recent content in Bms4001_p1 on HTSanalyzeR2

item.title: Enriched subnetwork analysis
item.description: Table of Contents Enriched subnetwork analysis Prepare input, initialize and preprocess Perform analysis and view the identified subnetwork Summarize results Enriched subnetwork analysis You can also perform subnetwork analysis (Beisser (2010), Dittrich MT (2008)) to extract the subnetwork enriched with nodes which are associated with a significant phenotype using HTSanalyzeR2. The network can either be fetched by our package to download specific species network from BioGRID database or defined by users.
